


<!-- @namespace    sugar.js.is -->
<!-- @name    isIe -->

# ```js isIe ```


Detect if is ie (internet explorer)

## Parameters

- **ua** (navigator.userAgent) String: The user agent on which to make the test



## Example (js)

```js
import isIe from '@coffeekraken/sugar/js/is/ie'
if (isIe()) {
  // do something cool
}
```
